sphericalLinearInterpolation(Quaternion, float, boolean) - Method in class org.jay3d.engine.core.math.Quaternion
More commonly known as Slerp, spherical linear interpolation was introduced by Ken shoemake, in context of quaternion interpolation for animating 3D rotation.
SpotLight - Class in org.jay3d.engine.core.components
SpotLight is a child class of PointLight, which uses cutoff on top of colour, attenuation and intensity.
